title: Diagnose Cell Tower Failure - Power Loss
description: An automated alert indicates a cell tower is offline. The agent must diagnose the root cause.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the alert for the specific tower ID and retrieve its diagnostic logs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly pulls the last 24 hours of logs for the specified cell tower.

tasks.description: Analyze logs for critical errors, identifying a 'power failure' error code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the primary error code from the logs.

tasks.description: Create a trouble ticket and assign it to the field engineering team responsible for power systems.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a ticket with the correct diagnosis and assigns it to the power systems team.
